title: elope My Little Pony Rainbow Dash Hoodie Hat
features: Loyal My Little Pony fans will love this officially licensed (Hasbro) Rainbow Dash hoodie hat
Features soft blue faux fur, shiny pony ears, a fun rainbow colored faux fur pony mane mohawk, and long tassles ending in orange furry puffs
For cool weather or costume wear. Hat only; other accessories sold separately
One size fits most kids and adults ages 14 and up
description: Size: One Size; Color: blue The company offers its customers a large variety of fun accessories from head to toe. elope is a B2B site based in Colorado Springs, Colorado that sells fun, party, and costume hats, glasses, sunglasses, and accessories to retailers around the world.
